t: Six of the Best American-Made Brandies You Can Buy Right Now | VinePair
s: May 7, 2021 - In craft distilling circles, brandy is a dark horse with major momentum. According to the Distilled Spirits Council, Americans bought 13.7 million 9-liter cases of brandy in 2017, to the tune of $2.3 billion. We bought less than 10 million cases of gin, and 9.3 million of Scotch.
